popover.primary: A mastery path focused on long range bow combat
A mastery path focused on toe-to-toe combat
A mastery path focused on short range and moving bow combat

data.name: Aimin' Quickly
data.description: Plink and Poison Arrer now builds up 1 seconds faster.
data.rawDescription: Plink and Poison Arrer now builds up {COM_0_VAL0_SECONDS} faster.

data.name: Extra Toxic Coating
data.description:
Poison Arrer applies a lingering poison for 10 seconds that takes effect when an enemies health drops below 25%, dealing 400 Corporeal damage.

Additionally, Explodin' Arrer and Poison Arrer will bypass your victim's resistances.
data.rawDescription:
Poison Arrer applies a lingering poison for {ABIL_3096_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} that takes effect when an enemies health drops below 25%, dealing {ABIL_3096_COM_1_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE}.

Additionally, Explodin' Arrer and Poison Arrer will bypass your victim's resistances.

data.name: All By Meself
data.description: You deal 25% more damage when you have no pets present and Squig Leap will have no cooldown.
data.rawDescription: You deal {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage when you have no pets present and Squig Leap will have no cooldown.

data.name: Ard Noggin
data.description: A powerful attack that deals 169 damage and reduces the threat generated by your pet's next attack.
data.rawDescription: A powerful attack that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reduces the threat generated by your pet's next attack.

data.name: Arrer O' Mork
data.description: Deals 800 damage to all targets in front of you within 40 feet, and then deals an additional 800 over 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all targets in front of you within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, and then deals an additional {COM_1_VAL0_TOD} over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Squig Leap
data.note:
Requires Squig Armor
You cannot perform this action while rooted
You cannot perform this action while stunned
data.description:
You pounce forwards, leaping towards your target. Your movement speed will subsequently be increased by 35% for 3 seconds. This speed increase will be dismissed if you use any ability.

This ability cannot be used while you are airborne or if there is a too big height difference between you and your target.
data.rawDescription:
You pounce forwards, leaping towards your target. Your movement speed will subsequently be increased by 35% for 3 seconds. This speed increase will be dismissed if you use any ability.

This ability cannot be used while you are airborne or if there is a too big height difference between you and your target.

data.name: Behind Ya!
data.note: Target must be facing away from you
data.description: A sneaky bow shot which deals 291 damage to the target. The critical hit chance of this ability is increased by the percentage of life lost by the target.
data.rawDescription: A sneaky bow shot which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to the target. The critical hit chance of this ability is increased by the percentage of life lost by the target.

data.name: Tastes Like Stuntie
data.description: Your Battle Squig spies a tasty morsel and proceeds to take chunks out of your target for up to 5 seconds, dealing 179 damage with each hit. You share in this treat and will be healed for all damage this ability deals.
data.rawDescription: Your Battle Squig spies a tasty morsel and proceeds to take chunks out of your target for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} with each hit. You share in this treat and will be healed for all damage this ability deals.

data.name: Big Bouncin!
data.description: You force your Battle Squig to bounce in the air for up to 3 seconds, repeatedly dealing 119 damage to all enemies within 30 feet.
data.rawDescription: You force your Battle Squig to bounce in the air for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, repeatedly dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET}.

data.name: Big Claw
data.description: You force your Battle Squig to claw at your target, dealing 318 damage over 9 seconds and snaring them by 40% over 9 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You force your Battle Squig to claw at your target, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and snaring them by {COM_1_VAL0}% over {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Bounce
data.description: You cause your Battle Squig to bounce, dealing 169 damage and knocking your target down for 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You cause your Battle Squig to bounce, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and knocking your target down for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Choking Arrer
data.description: A Crippling shot that deals 241 damage and silences your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use magic.
data.rawDescription: A Crippling shot that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and silences your target for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, making them unable to use magic.

data.name: Clever Recovery
data.description:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain 75 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
If an enemy dodges any of your attacks, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Scramblin' Quick-Like
data.description: Increases your Squig's movement speed by 50%.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Squig's movement speed by {COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.name: Sneaky Git
data.description: While in your Squig Armor, your defenses are increased by 10%.
data.rawDescription: While in your Squig Armor, your defenses are increased by 10%.

data.name: Concealment
data.description: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for 7 seconds.
data.rawDescription: With luck and experience you are able to Dodge all ranged attacks and Disrupt all magic attacks against you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Cut Ya!
data.description: An Ailment which deals 505 damage over 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: An Ailment which deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Da Smell Don't Bother Me
data.description: While in your Squig Armor, you are healed for 120 health every 5-seconds.
data.rawDescription: While in your Squig Armor, you are healed for {COM_1_VAL0_HEALTH} every 5-seconds.

data.name: Da Waaagh Iz Strong
data.description: Enemies affected by Rotten Arrer will take 181 Elemental damage each time they're healed. This effect will not trigger more than once every seconds.
data.rawDescription: Enemies affected by Rotten Arrer will take {ABIL_3352_COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} each time they're healed. This effect will not trigger more than once every seconds.

data.name: Don't Eat Me
data.description: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 50% damage to you for 15 seconds.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.
data.rawDescription: You Detaunt your target, making them hate you less and causing them to deal {COM_0_VAL0}% damage to you for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.  If you attack anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will immediately end.

data.name: Red Tipped Arrer!
data.description: You fire a quick arrow at your target, dealing 191 damage, interrupting any ability that they are building up and will remove one damage absorbing effect from the target. Any damage absorbing effect removed from the target will inflict an additional 200 damage.
data.rawDescription: You fire a quick arrow at your target, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}, interrupting any ability that they are building up and will remove one damage absorbing effect from the target. Any damage absorbing effect removed from the target will inflict an additional {ABIL_3089_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.name: Drop That!!
data.description: On the Squig's next attack, it will deal an additional 194 damage and disarm your target for 4 seconds, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.
data.rawDescription: On the Squig's next attack, it will deal an additional {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} and disarm your target for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, making them unable to use melee or ranged weapons.

data.name: 'Ere, Squiggy!
data.description: Any time you receive a direct healing effect, your squig will become healed for 25% of the value as long as it is within 30 feet.
data.rawDescription: Any time you receive a direct healing effect, your squig will become healed for 25% of the value as long as it is within 30 feet.

data.name: Expert Skirmisher
data.description: Your cast times are reduced to 50% when you are within 20 feet of your target.
data.rawDescription: Your cast times are reduced to {COM_0_VAL0}% when you are within 20 feet of your target.

data.name: Explodin' Arrer
data.description: An ailment which deals 183 Elemental damage and an additional 429 Elemental damage over 9 seconds to your target and all other enemies within 20 feet and knock them back a medium distance.
data.rawDescription: An ailment which deals {COM_0_VAL0_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} and an additional {ABIL_3901_COM_1_VAL0_TOD_ELEMENTALDAMAGE} over {ABIL_3901_COM_1_DURA_SECONDS} to your target and all other enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} and knock them back a medium distance.

data.name: Explosive Shots
data.description:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing 300 damage to all enemies within 20 feet of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.
data.rawDescription:
All of your ranged attacks will explode for the next 10 seconds, dealing {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of your target.
This effect will not trigger more than once every second.

data.name: Farty Squig
data.description: You cause your pet to explode, dealing 419 damage to enemies within 30 feet.  For the next 10 seconds, the next different squig other than the one that just exploded will be summoned instantly.
data.rawDescription: You cause your pet to explode, dealing {ABIL_15_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to enemies within {ABIL_15_COM_0_RADI_FEET}.  For the next {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, the next different squig other than the one that just exploded will be summoned instantly.

data.name: Finish 'em Off
data.description: Deals 566 damage if your target is below 30% hit points, or 265 damage otherwise.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} if your target is below 30% hit points, or {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} otherwise.

data.name: Flee
data.description:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by 30 for 10 seconds. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until 10 seconds have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.
data.rawDescription:
You run away from the battle in a mad panic, increasing your run speed by {COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You immediately lose all of your action points, any career mechanic points, and your Morale will begin to drop, and you will not begin to regain action points until {COM_4_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} have passed.

You can use this ability again to cancel the effect early, but you will still remain panicked and will not regain action points for the full duration.

data.name: Focused Mind
data.description: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.
data.rawDescription: For the next 10 seconds, you will remove and ignore any rooting, snaring, disarming, silencing or disabling effects. Your cast times are reduced by 50%, and you cannot be set back.

data.name: Gas Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a Gas squig pet which you can order around. This pet attacks from range, but is very weak to attacks.
This pet receives a bonus to Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill equal to your bonus from items.
Your range is increased by 15 feet as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.
data.rawDescription:
Summons a Gas squig pet which you can order around. This pet attacks from range, but is very weak to attacks.
This pet receives a bonus to Ballistic Skill and Weapon Skill equal to your bonus from items.
Your range is increased by {COM_2_RADI_FEET} as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Git Em!
data.description: You and your Squig attack together on each others target. You strike your target for 94 damage, and your pet strikes its target for 94 damage.  If you are within 35 feet of your pet's target, you will also strike that enemy for 94 damage, and likewise, if your pet is within 35 feet of your target, it will also strike your enemy for 94 damage as well.
data.rawDescription: You and your Squig attack together on each others target. You strike your target for {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}, and your pet strikes its target for {ABIL_18_COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.  If you are within {COM_2_RADI_FEET} of your pet's target, you will also strike that enemy for {COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE}, and likewise, if your pet is within {ABIL_18_COM_2_RADI_FEET} of your target, it will also strike your enemy for {ABIL_18_COM_2_VAL0_DAMAGE} as well.

data.name: Hail of Doom
data.description: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every 0.5 seconds for 5 seconds, hitting all enemies within 20 feet of that area for 300 damage as long as you maintain your concentration.
data.rawDescription: You focus on a spot on the ground, shooting arrows at that spot every {COM_1_FREQ_SECONDS} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}, hitting all enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} of that area for {COM_1_VAL0_DAMAGE} as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.name: He's A Biggun'
data.description: Your summoned Squig's Strength, Ballistic Skill and Wounds are increased by 160
data.rawDescription: Your summoned Squig's Strength, Ballistic Skill and Wounds are increased by {COM_0_VAL0}

data.name: Horned Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a Horned squig pet which you can order around. This pet deals more damage than a basic squig. It is strong against physical attacks, but weak against magic.
This pet receives a bonus to Strength equal to your Ballistic Skill bonus from items. This pet receives a bonus to Toughness and Wounds that is 50% of your bonus from items.
Your parry strikethrough is increased by 10% as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.
data.rawDescription:
Summons a Horned squig pet which you can order around. This pet deals more damage than a basic squig. It is strong against physical attacks, but weak against magic.
This pet receives a bonus to Strength equal to your Ballistic Skill bonus from items. This pet receives a bonus to Toughness and Wounds that is 50% of your bonus from items.
Your parry strikethrough is increased by {COM_2_VAL1}% as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: I Feelz Yer Pain
data.description:
Any time you critically hit with a Path of Big Shootin' ability, you will regain 50 Action Points.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
Any time you critically hit with a Path of Big Shootin' ability, you will regain {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_ACTIONPOINTS}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: I Got Lots
data.description: Your Squig pets no longer have cooldown times.
data.rawDescription: Your Squig pets no longer have cooldown times.

data.name: Indigestion
data.description: You prod the inside of your Battle Squig, causing it to deal 85 Corporeal damage to all targets 40 feet in front of you. The rancid juices cling to your foes, increasing the cooldowns of affected enemies by 1 second for each enemy you hit, to a maximum of 3 seconds. This effect lasts for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You prod the inside of your Battle Squig, causing it to deal {COM_2_VAL0_CORPOREALDAMAGE} to all targets {COM_4_RADI_FEET} in front of you. The rancid juices cling to your foes, increasing the cooldowns of affected enemies by 1 second for each enemy you hit, to a maximum of 3 seconds. This effect lasts for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: KABOOM!
data.description: Your Battle Squig explodes, causing you to be launched upward out of your Squiggy armor. All enemies within 10 feet take 304 damage and are knocked back.
data.rawDescription: Your Battle Squig explodes, causing you to be launched upward out of your Squiggy armor. All enemies within {COM_1_RADI_FEET} take {COM_3_VAL0_DAMAGE} and are knocked back.

data.rawDescription: You concentrate on your target for up to {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}, repeatedly shooting them for {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} as long as you maintain your concentration.

data.rawDescription: A well aimed arrow that deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE}.

data.rawDescription: Increases the armor penetration of all your ranged abilities by 25% as long as you have an active pet.

data.rawDescription: Increases critical hit rate of all Path of Quick Shootin' abilities by 15% and the critical damage of Red Tipped Arrer and Behind Ya! by 50%.

data.name: Shrapnel Arrer
data.description: On contact, your arrow explodes in to shrapnel, dealing 141 damage to your target and reduces range on their abilities to 75% for the next 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription: On contact, your arrow explodes in to shrapnel, dealing {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to your target and reduces range on their abilities to {COM_1_VAL1}% for the next {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Sneaky Bouncin'
data.description: Your damage is increased by 15% when under 45 feet away from your target.
data.rawDescription: Your damage is increased by {COM_0_VAL0}% when under 45 feet away from your target.

data.name: Spiked Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a Spiked squig pet which you can order around. This pet attacks from range and has increased damage.
This pet receives a bonus to Ballistic Skill equal to 150% of your bonus from items. This pet receives a bonus to Weapon Skill equal to 50% of your bonus from items.
You gain the ability to autoattack while moving, and your chance to critically hit is increased by 5% as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.
data.rawDescription:
Summons a Spiked squig pet which you can order around. This pet attacks from range and has increased damage.
This pet receives a bonus to Ballistic Skill equal to 150% of your bonus from items. This pet receives a bonus to Weapon Skill equal to 50% of your bonus from items.
You gain the ability to autoattack while moving, and your chance to critically hit is increased by {COM_2_VAL1}% as long as this squig is alive.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Shootin' Quicka
data.description: Increase autoattack speed by 50% for you and your pet as long as your pet is alive.
data.rawDescription: Increase autoattack speed by 50% for you and your pet as long as your pet is alive.

data.name: Squig Armor
data.description:
Summons a massive battle squig which will promptly eat you. From within the battle squig, you can poke and prod it to move it around and make it attack.
While in your Squig Armor; your armor is increased by the amount of armor gained from items, your Ballistic Skill from items also counts as Strength, your Ranged Power from items also counts as Melee Power, and your Ranged Critical chance from items also counts as Melee Critical chance.
data.rawDescription:
Summons a massive battle squig which will promptly eat you. From within the battle squig, you can poke and prod it to move it around and make it attack.
While in your Squig Armor; your armor is increased by the amount of armor gained from items, your Ballistic Skill from items also counts as Strength, your Ranged Power from items also counts as Melee Power, and your Ranged Critical chance from items also counts as Melee Critical chance.

data.name: Squig Frenzy
data.description: You whip your pet in to a frenzy, causing it to do 25% more damage for 20 seconds.
data.rawDescription: You whip your pet in to a frenzy, causing it to do {COM_0_VAL0}% more damage for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.rawDescription: A targeted area-effect attack that deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD} to all enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET}, and snares the targets by {COM_1_VAL0}%.

data.description: Pet Buff. Triples pet damage output and increases the size of your pet for 15 seconds.
data.rawDescription: Pet Buff. Triples pet damage output and increases the size of your pet for {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Outta My Way!
data.description: Channeled. You kick deep down your Squig's throat, causing it to rage. Its speed is increased by 75% for the next 10 seconds, as you plow through any enemies who dare stand in your way.

data.rawDescription: All enemies within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} become snared, reducing movement speed by {COM_0_VAL0}% for the next {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}. You are knocked back away from your enemies.

data.description: An Ailment which deals 191 damage and snares your target, reducing their run speed by 40% for 10 seconds.  This ability will continue to build up if you move.

data.name: Strength In Numbas
data.description:
Any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet of you hits an enemy, there is a 25% chance that you will regain 75 points of Morale over 3 seconds.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.
data.rawDescription:
Any time one of your groupmates within 100 feet of you hits an enemy, there is a 25% chance that you will regain {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0_TOD} points of Morale over {COM_2_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.
This effect will not trigger more than once every 3 seconds.

data.name: Summon Squig
data.note: You may only have 1 active pet
data.description:
Summons a basic squig pet which you can order around. This pet is very tough, and can take quite beating.
This pet receives a bonuses to Toughness and Wounds equal to your bonus from items.
This squig generates much more hatred in enemy monsters than normal.
When you are dealt damage, there is a 25% chance that 50% of the damage is dealt to your Basic Squig, if it is within 45 feet.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.
data.rawDescription:
Summons a basic squig pet which you can order around. This pet is very tough, and can take quite beating.
This pet receives a bonuses to Toughness and Wounds equal to your bonus from items.
This squig generates much more hatred in enemy monsters than normal.
When you are dealt damage, there is a 25% chance that 50% of the damage is dealt to your Basic Squig, if it is within 45 feet.
Cooldown will begin when you lose control of your pet for any reason.

data.name: Tastes Like Chicken
data.description: You eat your squig, increasing your wounds by 160 for 10 seconds. For the next 10 seconds, the next different squig other than the one that was just eaten will be summoned instantly.
data.rawDescription: You eat your squig, increasing your wounds by {ABIL_1889_COM_0_VAL0} for {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}. For the next {COM_2_DURA_SECONDS}, the next different squig other than the one that was just eaten will be summoned instantly.

data.name: Too Smart For Dat
data.description: Increases your Spirit resistance by 252.
data.rawDescription: Increases your Spirit resistance by {COM_0_VAL0}.

data.name: What Blocka?
data.description: An attack which deals 216 damage and reduces your target's armor by 618 and reduces their chance to block by 10% for 10 seconds.
data.rawDescription: An attack which deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} and reduces your target's armor by {COM_1_VAL0} and reduces their chance to block by {COM_2_VAL0}% for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}.

data.name: Whazat Behind You?!
data.description:
Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that you will Detaunt the enemy, making them hate you less and causing them to deal 75% damage to you for 5 seconds.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.
data.rawDescription:
Any time you are hit, there is a 25% chance that you will Detaunt the enemy, making them hate you less and causing them to deal {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_VAL0}% damage to you for {COM_1_VAL0_COM_0_DURA_SECONDS}.
If you hit anyone that you have Detaunted, the effect will end.

data.name: Wind Up Da Waaagh
data.description: Deals 1600 damage to all targets within 30 feet of you.
data.rawDescription: Deals {COM_0_VAL0_DAMAGE} to all targets within {COM_0_RADI_FEET} of you.

data.name: Yer Bleedin'!
data.description: An Ailment which deals 675 damage to your target over 10 seconds and reduces your target's Initiative by 50 for 10 seconds
data.rawDescription: An Ailment which deals {COM_0_VAL0_TOD_DAMAGE} to your target over {COM_0_DURA_SECONDS} and reduces your target's Initiative by {COM_1_VAL0} for {COM_1_DURA_SECONDS}
